text: "Secrets" is a song by Kosovan artist Regard and British singer-songwriter Raye, released on 23 April 2020. The single serves as the follow up to Regard's "Ride It", which received international commercial success after becoming a viral sensation on the app TikTok. A "garden acoustic" version of the song was released on 12 June 2020. A music video for the song was released on 19 June 2020. ==Music video== An official lyric video was released along with the song’s release on 23 April 2020. A video for the "garden acoustic" version of the song was released on 12 June 2020. The video portrays Raye singing and playing the piano in her backyard. The official music video for the song was released on 19 June 2020. ==Track listing== *Digital download #"Secrets" - 2:57 *Digital download – Garden Acoustic #"Secrets" (Garden Acoustic Version) - 3:45 *Digital download – Remix #"Secrets" (MOTi Remix) - 2:35 ==Charts== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center" |- ! scope="col" | Chart (2020) ! scope="col" | Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Australia (ARIA) | 24 |- |- |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Denmark (Tracklisten) | 20 |- ! scope="row"| France (SNEP) | 71 |- |- |- |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| New Zealand Hot Singles (RMNZ) | 14 |- |- ! scope="row"| Romania (Airplay 100) | 12 |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Serbia (Radiomonitor) | 1 |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Slovenia (SloTop50) | 20 |- ! scope="row"| Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) | 60 |- |- |- |- |- |} ==Certifications== ==References== Category:2020 singles Category:2020 songs Category:Songs about infidelity Category:Songs written by Raye (singer) Category:Songs written by Kennedi Lykken
title: Secrets (Regard and Raye song)
